description: MainActivity.kt defines the main user interface and core game logic for a Tic Tac Toe Android game. It manages UI components, user interactions, game state, and win/draw detection.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Activity hosting Tic Tac Toe game UI and logic, managing game state, user input, and display updates.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and binds event handlers.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user tapping a game cell, updates game state, and checks for win/draw conditions.

methods.name: findWinningLine
methods.description: Checks if the current board has a winning line and returns it.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Checks if the game board is fully occupied.

methods.name: updateTurnStatus
methods.description: Updates the UI to show which player's turn is next.

methods.name: disableAllCells
methods.description: Disables all game cells, typically after game over.

methods.name: enableAllCells
methods.description: Enables all game cells for a new game.

methods.name: clearCells
methods.description: Clears cell text and reset background colors.

methods.name: highlightWinningCells
methods.description: Highlights the cells that form the winning line.

methods.name: resetBoardState
methods.description: Resets internal game state variables to start a new game.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game UI and internal state for a fresh start.
